detectors.description:
Pausable.whenNotPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DGTToken.sol#766-769) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool,string)(! _paused,Pausable: paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DGTToken.sol#767)

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DGTToken.sol#557-564) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DGTToken.sol#561)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DGTToken.sol#562)
